alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Christian; Hopkins (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 7:02PM EDT until June 30 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Christian County in south central Kentucky... Northeastern Caldwell County in western Kentucky... Southern Hopkins County in northwestern Kentucky... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 602 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Olney, or 7 miles north of Dawson Springs, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Dawson Springs, Earlington, Nortonville, Mortons Gap, Olney, White Plains, St. Charles, Hawkins and Fryer. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 85 and 106. Pennyrile Parkway between Mile Markers 27 and 34. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
